title.rendered: Kid’s Corner + Columbus Walls of Books

content.rendered:
Kid’s Corner Next Week!

Kid’s Corner starts next week! Our first event is in Macon on Wednesday, June 14th, at 10:00. Representatives from Chick-fil-A® will be our guests!

Due to popular demand, we will be hosting our Warner Robins Kid’s Corner at TWO times each Thursday. It will be the same presentation, but we are spreading it out for sake of crowd control. The first session will be at 10:00 and the second will be at 11:00. We will start on June 15th. Representatives from Covenant Care Adoption Services will be our guests!

 

Walls of Books, Columbus Update

We shelved 22,000 books in a little under three days!

excerpt.rendered: Kid’s Corner starts next week! Our first event is in Macon on Wednesday, June 14th, at 10:00. Representatives from Chick-fil-A® will be our guests!
